data.text: @hericoth @nzherald There is another video of it from the opposite side. Police were hitting a woman cowering on the ground. Old guy goes to rescue her. Police then punch him, he loses his balance and falls to the ground.

@Jo_Bond @nzherald Yep wrong place wrong time. Police were subject to missiles. So stiff shite old or not. Told to move on and he didn't. Playing for keeps - none of the surgery shite. Go protest about war atrocities in the Ukraine instead of about wearing mask and getting FREE vaccine.
@nzherald Great job under extreme conditions . Thanks to the brave police who had to deal with those thugs and anarchists yesterday!
@Jennyhoeta59 @nzherald How cool is this, when a bro hits his own bro. #dumbgunt https://t.co/xtRtek2da1
@Jo_Bond @nzherald Yawn I think people should stop complaining about self inflicted issues
@nzherald Hosking couldn't care less about what they did just as long as it makes Jacinda and Labour look bad. He's a right plonker. https://t.co/GABCfsXZO5
